title: Import Wallet | Polkadex Orderbook
heading: Import trade account
description: Do you have a trade account? Import it here and start trading

card.heading: What do you use mnemonic for?
card.description: A Mnemonic Phrase is also called Seed Phrase or Recovery Backup for a decentralized wallet. It is a list of words and proof of ownership of your crypto assets. Polkadex does not store any information about your wallet.
card.strongText: Never share your mnemonic phrase with anyone
